description: Detects disabling Windows Defender Tamper Protection Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Disable Tamper Protection on Windows Defender
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Features\\TamperProtection* AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000000\)") AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe)))
